meanings.definition: A molecule consisting of two amino acids joined by a peptide bond.
meanings.sent1: Dipeptides are like tiny amino acid pairs.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study dipeptides to understand how amino acids bond.
meanings.sent3: The dipeptides in the lab were chatting about their peptide bond.
meanings.sent4: In the protein world, dipeptides are the dynamic duos.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, dipeptides look like miniature amino acid teams.

meanings.sent1: Proteins are made up of many dipeptides.
meanings.sent2: Athletes need dipeptides to build strong muscles.
meanings.sent3: The dipeptides in the gym were lifting weights to become proteins.
meanings.sent4: In the recipe of life, dipeptides are the essential ingredients.
meanings.sent5: Dipeptides are the Lego blocks that form the protein structures.
